channel.title: 5m what armour
channel.description:
Ok i have kind of no idea if this is in wrong area or not but o well
Ok i have just got 5m for free i am called = oli356 with: 75 attack 74str 72def 54range 52prayer 62mage 72hp
I dont now what armour to buy i love the look of veracs and i think it looks cool and goes threw prayer :D but i dont now if i shuld get dharoks since it dus a massive high hit at low hp.
Or other armour
could you please post like saying veracs or dharoks or dragon legs with verac brassard to tell me what i should buy and whats better thanks
